plot: Séamus is at home watching TV with his family, when the doorbell rings. He answers the door to Toshiro, a Samurai, who engages him in a battle for a belonging of Toshiro's that Séamus has failed to return.
title: Toshiro
plot_es: Séamus is at home watching TV with his family, when the doorbell rings. He answers the door to Toshiro, a Samurai, who engages him in a battle for a belonging of Toshiro's that Séamus has failed to return.
